entities.name: death eater
entities.description: The group that Harry and others are accused of wanting to join. ("You and your precious little Death Eater friends")

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: A person or entity that the Death Eaters aim to join, but not explicitly stated who it is. ("You-Know-Who")

entities.name: severus snape
entities.description: The adult version of Snape, a teacher at Hogwarts. ("Severus")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, who is being accused by Snape and others. ("Harry")

relationships.description: The Death Eaters aim to join You-Know-Who. ("You canâ€™t wait to join You-Know-Who, can you?")
